      ğŸ’» ë‚´ ì½”ë“œ (Try 1)

      import java.util.*;
import java.lang.*;
import java.io.*;

class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception{
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        int N = Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());

        int[] dp = new int[N+1];
        dp[1]=0;
        for(int i=2; i<N+1; i++){
            int cur = i;
            if( i%2 != 0 && i%3 != 0) {
                dp[i] = dp[cur - 1] + 1;
            }else if(cur%3==0){
                int prev = dp[cur/3];
                if(cur%2==0){
                    prev = Math.min(dp[cur/3], dp[cur/2]);
                }
                dp[i] = Math.min(prev, dp[cur-1]) + 1;
            }else if(cur%2==0){
                dp[i] = Math.min(dp[cur/2], dp[cur-1]) + 1;
            }
        }

        System.out.println(dp[N]);
    }
}

      // âœ˜ ë³µì¡í•œ if-else ì²´ì¸
if( i%2 != 0 && i%3 != 0) {
    dp[i] = dp[cur - 1] + 1;
}else if(cur%3==0){
    int prev = dp[cur/3];
    if(cur%2==0){
        prev = Math.min(dp[cur/3], dp[cur/2]);
    }
    dp[i] = Math.min(prev, dp[cur-1]) + 1;
}else if(cur%2==0){
    dp[i] = Math.min(dp[cur/2], dp[cur-1]) + 1;

      import java.io.*;

class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception{
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        int N = Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());

        int[] dp = new int[N+1];
        
        for(int i=2; i<=N; i++){
            // ê¸°ë³¸: 1 ë¹¼ê¸°
            dp[i] = dp[i-1] + 1;
            
            // 2ë¡œ ë‚˜ëˆ„ê¸°
            if(i % 2 == 0){
                dp[i] = Math.min(dp[i], dp[i/2] + 1);
            }
            
            // 3ìœ¼ë¡œ ë‚˜ëˆ„ê¸°
            if(i % 3 == 0){
                dp[i] = Math.min(dp[i], dp[i/3] + 1);
            }
        }

        System.out.println(dp[N]);
    }
}

      dp[i] = 1 + min(
